results.description: Anderlecht appoint Vincent Kompany's former manager Frank Vercauteren as head coach in an attempt to curb the club's poor start to the season.
results.shortTitle: Kompany's Anderlecht make staff changes
results.title: Vincent Kompany: Anderlecht appoint former manager Frank Vercauteren as head coach

results.description: Vincent Kompany's woes as Anderlecht player-manager continue as his side draw with Waasland-Beveren in the Belgian First Division A.
results.shortTitle: Kompany's woes continue at Anderlecht
results.title: Anderlecht 0-0 Waasland-Beveren: Vincent Kompany's woes continue

results.description: Celtic sign defenders Lee O'Connor and Jeremie Frimpong on four-year deals.
results.shortTitle: Celtic sign defenders O'Connor and Frimpong
results.title: Celtic sign defensive duo Lee O'Connor and Jeremie Frimpong

results.description: Southampton defender Wesley Hoedt joins Belgian Pro League side Royal Antwerp on a season-long loan.
results.shortTitle: Southampton's Hoedt joins Antwerp on loan
results.title: Wesley Hoedt joins Royal Antwerp from Southampton on season-long loan

results.description: Striker Stefano Okaka joins Italian side Udinese from Watford on a three-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Okaka joins Udinese from Watford
results.title: Stefano Okaka: Italy striker joins Udinese from Watford

results.description: The arrival of Colombia's Radamel Falcao sees Turkish club Galatasaray send Senegal's Mbaye Niang on loan to Club Bruges.
results.shortTitle: Falcao arrival sees Diagne loaned by Galatasaray
results.title: Falcao arrival sees Mbaye Diagne sent on loan by Galatasaray

results.description: Stoke City's record signing Giannelli Imbula joins Serie A side Lecce on a season-long loan.
results.shortTitle: Stoke's Imbula loaned out for third time
results.title: Giannelli Imbula: Stoke City's record signing joins Lecce in Serie A on loan

results.description: Belgium winger Kevin Mirallas has joined Royal Antwerp in his home country after seven years at Everton.
results.shortTitle: Mirallas leaves Everton for Antwerp
results.title: Kevin Mirallas leaves Everton to join Royal Antwerp

results.description: Tottenham agree a deal with Belgian side Club Bruges over the transfer of Kenyan midfielder Victor Wanyama.
results.shortTitle: Spurs agree Wanyama transfer to Bruges
results.title: Victor Wanyama: Tottenham and Club Bruges agree deal for Kenya midfielder

results.description: Former Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany picks up an injury during Anderlecht's defeat by Belgian champions Genk.
results.shortTitle: Kompany injured in Anderlecht defeat
results.title: Vincent Kompany injured in Anderlecht's defeat by Genk

results.description: Anderlecht's Vincent Kompany is to relinquish his managerial duties on match days in order to concentrate on playing.
results.shortTitle: Kompany changes role at Anderlecht
results.title: Vincent Kompany: Anderlecht boss gives up managerial duties on match days

results.description: KV Mechelen say they will take "the necessary steps at Fifa" after Sheffield United sign goalkeeper Michael Verrips.
results.shortTitle: Mechelen take action over Blades signing
results.title: KV Mechelen go to Fifa over goalkeeper Michael Verrips' move to Sheffield United

results.description: Kilmarnock are poised to make Waasland-Beveren forward Floriano Vanzo their fourth summer signing, manager Angelo Alessio has confirmed.
results.shortTitle: Kilmarnock set to sign striker Vanzo
results.title: Floriano Vanzo: Kilmarnock set to sign Belgian striker

results.description: Leeds United forward Kemar Roofe completes a move to Belgian club Anderlecht for an undisclosed fee.
results.shortTitle: Leeds' Roofe completes Anderlecht move
results.title: Kemar Roofe: Leeds United forward completes Anderlecht move

results.description: Marcelo Bielsa says Leeds will "have to adapt" if last season's leading scorer Kemar Roofe joins Anderlecht this week.
results.shortTitle: Bielsa 'can't be happy if Roofe leaves'
results.title: Marcelo Bielsa: Leeds United head coach 'can't be happy' if Kemar Roofe leaves club

thumbnail.altText: Leeds United head coach Marcelo Bielsa

results.description: Liverpool goalkeeper Simon Mignolet signs for Belgian side Club Bruges for 7m euros (£6.4m).
results.shortTitle: Club Bruges sign Mignolet for £6.4m
results.title: Simon Mignolet: Liverpool goalkeeper signs for Club Bruges

results.description: Aston Villa sign Zimbabwe international midfielder Marvelous Nakamba from Club Bruges - their 12th signing of the summer.
results.shortTitle: Villa sign Nakamba from Club Bruges
results.title: Marvelous Nakamba: Aston Villa sign Zimbabwe midfielder from Club Bruges

results.description: Bournemouth sign Dutch winger Arnaut Danjuma from Club Bruges for 15m euros for the club's fourth summer signing.
results.shortTitle: Cherries sign Danjuma from Club Bruges
results.title: Arnaut Danjuma: Bournemouth sign Dutch winger for £13.7m from Club Bruges

results.description: South Africa striker Percy Tau goes on a season-long loan to Belgian side Club Bruges for English club Brighton.
results.shortTitle: Brighton loan out South Africa's Tau again
results.title: Brighton loan South Africa's Percy Tau to Club Bruges

results.description: Former Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany loses his first Belgian First Division A match as player-manager of RSC Anderlecht.
results.shortTitle: Anderlecht boss Kompany loses first game
results.title: Vincent Kompany beaten in first league game as Anderlecht boss
